title: After Zomato, Deepinder Goyal returns with a $54M brain-monitoring bet
summary: Zomato co-founder Deepinder Goyal's new wearable startup Temple has raised $54 million in a friends-and-family round at a post-money valuation of about $190 million.

title: OpenAI raises $110B in one of the largest private funding rounds in history
summary: The new funding consists of a $50 billion investment from Amazon as well as $30 billion each from Nvidia and SoftBank, against a $730 billion valuation.

title: Memory shortage could cause the biggest dip in smartphone shipments in over a decade
summary: IDC says phone makers will ship only 1.12 billion smartphones as compared to 1.26 billion last year.

title: South Korea opens the door to let Google Maps operate fully
summary: After years of appeals, Google has finally won approval to export high-precision geographic information out of South Korea and provide proper Google Maps services in the country, including walking and real-time driving directions.

title: Ultrahuman bets on redesigned smart ring to win back U.S. market after Oura dispute
summary: Ultrahuman’s Ring Pro promises 15-day battery life and a $479 price tag as the wearables maker expands its health-tech push.

title: Plaid valued at $8B in employee share sale
summary: The new valuation is a 31% increase from $6.1 billion Plaid reached in April.

title: Netflix backs out of bid for Warner Bros. Discovery, giving studios, HBO, and CNN to Ellison-owned Paramount
summary: In a one-two punch of centibillion-dollar offers, the bidding war for Warner Bros. Discovery is over. David Ellison-owned Paramount will acquire Warner Bros. Discovery. Netflix has lost.

title: Jack Dorsey just halved the size of Block’s employee base — and he says your company is next
summary: Jack Dorsey has long been an open admirer of Elon Musk. Now, it seems, he may have been taking notes.

title: Anthropic CEO stands firm as Pentagon deadline looms
summary: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei said Thursday that he "cannot in good conscience accede" to the Pentagon's demands to give the military unrestricted access to its AI systems.

title: PayPal might not be looking to sell itself: Report
summary: PayPal may not be in talks to be acquired, sources have told Semafor, after a previous news report that Stripe was sniffing around.

title: Threads is testing a shortcut to quickly start DM conversations
summary: Users who are part of the test can type "DM me" or "Message me" in a post or reply to automatically generate a hyperlink that invites others to start a private conversation with them.

title: Show HN: RetroTick – Run classic Windows EXEs in the browser
summary:
RetroTick parses PE/NE/MZ binaries, emulates an x86 CPU, and stubs enough Win32/Win16/DOS APIs to run classics like FreeCell, Minesweeper, Solitaire and QBasic, entirely in the browser. Built with Preact + Vite + TypeScript.

Demo: https://retrotick.com

GitHub: https://github.com/lqs/retrotick
